title: Watching random games/matches
body:
There use to be a random game/match I can spectate but now there is no random game/match that I can spectate.
Anyone know why did they erase it from the client?
Love watching people play :(

replies.body:
If you go into "leagues" in your client, and view the top challenger players you can watch their games. Just look for the names with a little eye next to them and click "spectate". Unfortunately you can only view these players and the ones on your friends list at the moment ♥

Alternatively, you can always watch players on twitch and youtube.
